item.description: First meetup at my place. Bring whatever project you're currently working on or would like to start. I have some basic craft materials (and I have a sewing machine), but you should bring anything you might need. I will provide some snacks, but feel free to bring snacks and drinks to share, or a couple of bucks if you want to chip in to get a pizza. No smoking inside please.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Night Craft-o-rama
